{"rule":"NON_STANDARD_WORD","sentence":"^\\QCtrl+D Duplicate selected clock(s)\nCtrl+S Save (in clock editor dialog)\\E$"}

{"rule":"COMMA_PERIOD","sentence":"^\\QMove cursor one digit right PgUp, Right\nMove cursor one digit left Backspace (except DHMS days), PgDn, Left\nMove cursor to next field Tab In DHMS days: / (forward slash), .\\E$"}
{"rule":"FULL_TIME","sentence":"^\\Q(decimal)\nMove cursor to previous field Shift+Tab\nMove to start of full time entry Home\nMove to end of full time entry End\nIncrement current field Up\nDecrement current field Down\nIncrement single digit under cursor Ctrl+Up\nDecrement single digit under cursor Ctrl+Down\nClear current field/reset to zero Delete (In DHMS days, only when cursor in trailing blank space)\\E$"}

{"rule":"WHITESPACE_RULE","sentence":"^\\QS (Fractional seconds) \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q  \nM (Fractional minutes) \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q  \nH (Fractional hours) \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q  \nD (Fractional days) \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q  \nDHMS (assumed positive) \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q a list of four numbers is assumed to be DHMS with positive sign\nDHMS (with sign) \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q a list with five numbers is assumed to be DHMS with the fifth value being 1 for positive and -1 for negative\nY_DOY_HMS \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q while also a list of five numbers, this is not implicitly assumed and user mus specify input format in the JSON\nYMDHMS \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-|Dummy\\+|Dummy's\\+)[0-9]+\\Q list of six values is always assumed YMDHMS\\E$"}
